name: dockge
tagline: A self-hosted UI for managing Docker Compose stacks and services
description: Dockge is a sleek, self-hosted Docker compose manager that provides an intuitive UI for viewing, editing, and managing your Compose stacks. It supports real-time logs, service actions, and deployment functionality.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Visual interface for Docker Compose stacks. Simplified orchestration

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Stream logs from all services live. Instant debugging

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Modify compose files through web UI. No SSH required

features.title: Service Control
features.description: Start, stop, and restart services individually. Granular management

features.title: Deployment Tools
features.description: Deploy new stacks with ease. Streamlined operations

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Beautiful compose manager on your infrastructure. Complete stack control
